sentences.en: Although the Dream is beautiful, its primal savagery can also be deadly.
sentences.cn: 虽然翡翠梦境是美丽的, 但是它原始的野性也是相当致命的.

sentences.en: He beat the dog with great savagery.
sentences.cn: 他极其残忍地打那条狗.

sentences.en: His reputation for savagery and belligerence is nothing but a myth.
sentences.cn: 它的野蛮好斗的名声纯系神话.

sentences.en: It is this savagery that has given rise to the legends of brutal, uncontrollable man - beasts.
sentences.cn: 正是这种野性造成了那些关于残忍的歇斯底里的半人 半 兽的传说.

sentences.en: Local people were shocked by the savagery of the attack.
sentences.cn: 当地人为这次凶残的袭击感到震惊。

sentences.en: Savagery was the formative period of the human race.
sentences.cn: 蒙昧阶段是人类的形成阶段.

sentences.en: The firm are gentle, weak men often betray their hidden savagery.
sentences.cn: 坚定的人是温和的, 脆弱的人常常暴露自己隐藏的野性.

sentences.en: The people think he is a nobler savagery.
sentences.cn: 人们认为他是个高贵的野蛮人.

sentences.en: They threw away their advantage by their savagery to the black population.
sentences.cn: 他们因为野蛮对待黑人居民而丧失了自己的有利地位.

sentences.en: Without and beyond, the world lay in darkness, ignorance, and savagery.
sentences.cn: 在外面和较远的一边, 世界处于黑暗 、 无知和野性中.

words.tran_cn: 野蛮的；残酷的；狂怒的；荒凉的
未开化的；粗鲁的人；残暴成性的人

trans.tran_cn: 野蛮，野蛮人，凶猛，荒凉的状态
